divs: sighting details it has been around 12 years since we saw it. i will try one more time to explain it for mufon. you see i first documented my sighting on a different website, but have yet to examine a closley simular encounter on the same or near date as the night we saw it in that area. it was truly scary. on july 5th @ around 1am in the morning i saw a greenish light in the sky just above the coastal range. we were camping at the same place we've camped for 10 years plus. it is located near the dunes approx 15 mins walk to the ocean. my husband had just put on the last couple of logs for the goodnight fire. i then asked him if he saw the greenish lights. well it so happend that by the time he even looked, the lights they were way more defined. as in> there was a quite bright light in front of the object that was the tip of it. and it was turning more of a bluish color in the what seemed to be the total of the triangluar shape. he then began to shine a very bright light at it. it then began to come even closer to us. by this time i was soooo frightened by the defined sight of it . it was a translusint type color of bluish\green in the middle of each bright light that the triangle consisted of. the front one being the brightest. there was only a low hhuummiinng sound as it went so very slightly from right to left as if it was surveying the lake, dunesand land or somthing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around July 5th 1997
